DOC.brief_summary: Aim : Investigating effect Clinical Pilates Exercise kinesiophobia , pain , functional status quality life patient diagnosed osteoporosis . Method : 47 patient assess randomly divide 2 group . Exercise group patient join exercise program regularly hold 3 time week , 1 hour day , 6 week physiotherapist . Control group patient continue normal daily life without exercise . After 7 patient quit study various reason , 40 woman primary osteoporosis ( control group n=20 , exercise group n= 20 ) , complete study assess begin end 6 week . As assesment ' measurement Tampa Kinesiophobia Scale ( TKS ) , Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) , Short Form McGill ( SF-McGill ) , Pain Disability Index ( PDI ) , Oswestry Disability Index ( ODI ) , Berg Balance Test ( BBT ) , Timed Up- Go Test ( TUG ) , Chair Sit-Stand Test ( CSST ) , Chair Sit Reach Test ( CSRT ) , Back Scratch Test ( BST ) , Quality life Questionnaire European Foundation Osteoporosis ( QUALEFFO-41 ) , Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale ( HADS ) , Satisfaction Life Scale ( SLS ) Health Assesment Questionnaire ( HAQ ) perform .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of Exercises On Kinesiophobia , And Other Symptoms Related Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Woman diagnose osteoporosis age 5075 within last year Exclusion Criteria History fracture Joint replacement fixation joint low extremity spine Any neurological muscle disease Inability continuously attend exercise program Any secondary disease result decreased mobility functional status Visual , hear mental problem could prevent communication
